item.title: Nvidia and Palantir Stocks Are Falling Today. Here’s Why
item.description: An investor famous for betting against the housing market before it collapsed now has his sights on companies at the forefront of the AI boom.

item.title: How to Get Workers and Employers on the Same Page About Salary Negotiations
item.description: It turns out that you, as the boss, may be the problem: staff don’t think you’re open to salary discussions.

item.title: Employee Might Be Working A Second Job During Our Workday
item.description: How can I find out what’s really going on?

item.title: Popular Sandwich Chain Undergoes Massive Overhaul, Closing Bakeries
item.description: Panera Bread announced its plan to close the last of its fresh dough facilities.

item.title: To Grow Your Brand, Don’t Overlook This Audience
item.description: Underrepresented communities aren’t niche. They’re the engine of tomorrow’s market growth. Smart brands are evolving.
